label.ai_need_screening: The content is generated with the help of AI, so please screen it carefully.
label.chat_no_message_placeholder: Hello, I am {who}. Please send me message.
label.slogan: Lightweight AI assistant based on deep content understanding

tip.chat_retrace: The number of history messages to be recalled in each conversation, the greater the value, the more history messages will be recalled and the more tokens will be consumed. Generally, it is recommended to set it to 4 ~ 8.
tip.chat_temperature: The greater the value, the more varied the generated content will be. A value of 0 makes the generated content the most stable, and a value of 0.6 is recommended for general dialog.
